oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Wrestling Office (19932)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Hatch Show Print (Firm); Wrestling; Watanabe, Harold; Mann, Dale; Thesz, Lou; Barber, Jerry
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Typed order letter for the Wrestling office requesting 100 1-color window cards to announce the "World's Greatest NWA Wrestling" events at the National Guard Armory in Livermore. Events include Tojo Yamamoto vs. Big Dale Mann, Lou Thesz vs. Morerican Angel, Jerry Barber vs. Joltin Joe Palardy and others.
